name: The Last Couple
description:
The city is in danger and you are the last couple in this city! Help each other and survive! Remember the only way to cure and save each other is gather together and share each other love!

There will be weapon supplies on those zombies. Take it back!

Oh! Forget to tell, it is a double-player game! Please invite your friends to play with you together!

Controll: 

P1: WASD - Move, G - Switch weapon, H - Attack

P2: Up, Down, Left, Right arrow - Move, K - Switch weapon, L - Attack

Remember! The only way to survive is you guys together! No matter curing or saving each other!

Don't forget to rate it if you like!
